snippet: Scott Becher joined Zimmerman Advertising, Fort Lauderdale, Fla., part of the Omnicom Group, as an executive vice president and managing director, leading the agency’s partnership marketing team.
lead_paragraph: Scott Becher joined Zimmerman Advertising, Fort Lauderdale, Fla., part of the Omnicom Group, as an executive vice president and managing director, leading the agency’s partnership marketing team.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
